main.name: Shashank Singh
main.description: Programming and Commerce Enthusiast, Content and Graphic Designer
main.bio: A hardworking, highly motivated and ambitious final year engineering student from University of Delhi in the field of Information Technology, with a keen interest in programming, mathematics, commerce and designing. Likes to explore new fields & new interests, easily adaptable to new environments, and also makes friends easily. Has good problem solving ability and analytical skills. Has a liking for open source and is looking for an opportunity to work with these great minds.
main.contactmessage: For any Query/Issue, feel free to contact me.
